articles.author: New York Post
articles.title: How Scott Presler helped Trump win Pennsylvania
articles.description: Scott Presler founded Early Vote Action, which helped register Republicans and get out the vote in Pennsylvania, helping Donald Trump retake the Keystone State in 2024.
articles.content:
PITTSBURGH — Scott Presler is a giant of a man.
Standing at 6’5″ and 200 pounds with 22 inches of long brown hair running down his back, the gay conservative political activist told The Post, “I’m a big boy.”
Presler proved himself to be something of... [6249 chars]

articles.author: Devdiscourse
articles.title: World News Roundup: Political Tensions and Security Measures Intensify
articles.description: This content offers a summary of global news highlights. Key stories include Trudeau promising Trump tougher border controls, Romanian elections favoring ruling leftists over far-right, intensified attacks in Syria, and Meta imposing stricter financial ad rules in Australia. Additionally, ongoing tensions, protests, and negotiations are covered from various regions.
articles.content: Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau has assured President-elect Donald Trump of reinforced border controls, aiming to curb migrant and drug crossings. A senior Canadian official disclosed that Trudeau met Trump in Florida, discussing tariffs on Ca... [529 chars]

articles.author: Devdiscourse
articles.title: US Domestic News Snapshot: Online Spending Surges, Political Maneuverings in Focus
articles.description: This summary includes key issues like muted U.S. Black Friday store spending contrasted with robust online growth, Trump-Trudeau discussions amid tariff tensions, Trump's appointments including Massad Boulos, Ben Wikler's bid for DNC chair, Kash Patel's FBI nomination, threats to lawmakers and cabinet picks, RFK Jr.'s Romanian meeting, and Biden hosting the AIDS Memorial Quilt.
articles.content: Retail dynamics shifted in the U.S. as Black Friday spending showcased a subdued growth in physical stores, overshadowed by a significant rise in online shopping. Mastercard reported just a 0.7% increase in brick-and-mortar sales, revealing consumers... [639 chars]

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Trump names Massad Boulos as senior adviser on Middle East
articles.description: Donald Trump says Massad Boulos, a Lebanese American businessman who is the father-in-law of Trump’s daughter Tiffany, will be a senior adviser on Arab and Middle Eastern affairs.
articles.content:
WEST PALM BEACH, Fla. (AP) — President-elect Donald Trump on Sunday named Massad Boulos, a Lebanese American businessman who is the father-in-law of Trump’s daughter Tiffany, as a senior adviser on Arab and Middle Eastern affairs.

articles.title: How Much Did Trump Spend on Hair Transplants? Celebrity Plastic Surgeon Reveals The Astonishing Amount
articles.description: Trump claimed $70,000 tax deductions for hair care expenses while filming his hit reality show 'The Apprentice'.
articles.content: President-elect Donald Trump has been obsessed with styling his hair perfectly, in 2020 The New York Times exposed that the Republican leader spent more than $70,000 on hairstyling while hosting The Apprentice. Additionally, the publication reported ... [3594 chars]

articles.title: Trump’s tariff threat would hurt Ontario economy
articles.description: If U.S. President-elect Donald Trump follows through on a threat to impose a 25 per cent tariff on all Canadian imports, Ontario will likely see the brunt of the impact, a business professor at Carleton University says.

articles.author: Raw Story
articles.title: 'Shakes me to my core': Legal expert says Trump's harm to justice system 'can be undone'
articles.description:
Donald Trump and the U.S. Supreme Court damaged the justice system, but the harm can be undone, a former prosecutor said Sunday.
	Former federal prosecutor Glenn Kirschner, who over the weekend posted a video focusing on "points of light," as he sees them, in the legal world, chimed in a day late...

articles.title: Trump FBI Pick Kash Patel Racks Up Massive Following After Joining X
articles.description: President-elect Donald Trump's pick for FBI director, Kash Patel, received a seismic welcome to the social media platform Sunday.
articles.content:
Kash Patel, Donald Trump's pick for FBI director, has joined social media platform X, formerly Twitter, on Sunday—racking up hundreds of thousands of followers in less than a day from when he was nominated by the president-elect.

articles.description: In a heavily edited propaganda video, Edan Alexander pleads for Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu and U.S. President-elect Donald Trump to free him and the other 100 hostages held by Hamas.

articles.title: Quebec forest industry already under pressure amid Trump tariff threat: Legault
articles.description: Quebec’s premier has raised concerns about the potential impact of the tariff proposed by U.S. president-elect Donald Trump on the province’s forest industry.
articles.content: Quebec Premier François Legault is raising concerns about the province's forestry industry in the face of U.S. president-elect Donald Trump's tariff threats. Logs are shown at a softwood lumber sawmill on Nov. 14, 2008 in Saguenay, Quebec. THE CANADI... [2636 chars]
